name: Cookie Planet: Match 3 Party
description: Hey! Match 3 lovers here is the kingdom of sweet candy so you can crush the cookies and candy in the blast mania. Have extreme fun in the match 3 puzzle game. Swap and match cookies and candy to pass the level. Unlock the fun bonuses and win unique sugary levels. Go fast to the kingdom by match the cookies and save your empire from mouse and monsters. Jam your cookies and crush them with by twist and match. Crush cookies and candy by making awesome match combinations with your fingers.
